meaning: स्नानं = bathingम्लानम् = lazy, dullअभूत = has become, has beenक्रिया = action, activityन = notच = andThe breakdown:स्नानं (snānam) = bathingम्लानम् (mlānam) = lazy, dullअभूत (abhūt) = has becomeक्रिया (kriyā) = action, activityन (na) = notच (cha) = andMeaning:The action of bathing has become lazy and dull, and is not happening.
